# Drone News 48h Brief — September 01, 2025

_Window: last 48 hours; 33 incidents._

## Summary
In the past 48 hours, a discernible trend of drone-related incidents has emerged, particularly in Colombia, where dissident groups are ramping up drone attacks and the use of IEDs. Meanwhile, in the United States, authorities reported significant drone-related arrests, including a case involving fentanyl smuggling into prisons via drones. Belgium announced plans to implement autonomous drone monitoring in prisons to enhance security. Notably, drone smuggling incidents have been thwarted in the Southern Military Zone, indicating active law enforcement measures to combat illegal drone usage. As tensions rise in Ukraine, Russian drone strikes have been reported, further emphasizing the international security implications of drone technology.

**By category:** airport: 3 • arrest: 4 • crash: 5 • other: 8 • security: 1 • smuggling: 12
**Top queries:** drone prison (8), drone terrorism (6), drone arrest (4), drone smuggling (4), drone airport disruption (3)
